name: Mega Man 3
overview: THE THRILLS AND EXCITEMENT OF THE TOP ARCADE GAME IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND! Dr.Wily has created the ultimate legion of enemy robots: Snake Man, Gemini Man, Needle Man, Shadow Man, Spark Man, and Magnet Man! Each possesses the power to smash Mega Man into oblivion! But each time you defeat a robot stageguard, you gain his weapon for your own use! With only you and his trusty robot dog to guide him, Mega Man must survive 7 deadly battle stages -- before battling Dr. Wily in an explosive final showdown!
